game.name: The Last Transmission
game.shortDescription: You are alone at a remote radio station, monitoring radio transmissions. A storm is moving in. Then a call. You respond. A voice, not human, not possible. It knows you’re here. Now the storm is here. And this time... it’s staying.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are alone at a remote radio station, monitoring radio transmissions. A storm is moving in. Then a call. You respond. A voice, not human, not possible. It knows you’re here. Now the storm is here. And this time... it’s staying.
